Uses of Class
pingball.physics.Gadget

  • Packages that use Gadget 
    Package Description
    pingball.physics  

    • Uses of Gadget in pingball.physics

      Subclasses of Gadget in pingball.physics 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Absorber
      An Absorber is a type of Gadget that has a variable size.
      class  CircleBumper
      CircleBumper is a type of Gadget that can exist in Pingball.
      class  Flipper
      A Flipper is a movable Gadget that can hit a ball.
      (package private) class  OuterWalls
      OuterWalls is a special type of Gadget that is used to monitor reflections of balls off of the outer boundaries of the playing field.
      class  SquareBumper
      SquareBumper is a type of Gadget that can exist in Pingball.
      class  TriangularBumper
      TriangularBumper is a type of Gadget that can exist in Pingball.
      Fields in pingball.physics with type parameters of type Gadget 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<Gadget> Board.activeGadgets
      Stores a list of the gadgets that are currently active and performing an action
      private java.util.List<Gadget> Board.deactivatedGadgets
      Stores the list of deactivated gadgets
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Gadget> Board.gadgets
      Stores the names of the gadgets mapped to the actual gadget
      protected java.util.List<Gadget> Gadget.triggers
      List of other board objects that need to be triggered when this object is triggered.
      Methods in pingball.physics that return types with arguments of type Gadget 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private Pair<java.lang.Double,Pair<Gadget,Ball>> Board.findEarliestGadgetCollision()
      Finds the earliest time where a ball and a gadget will collide and returns a struct containing that earliest time along with the gadget and ball in the collision
      Methods in pingball.physics with parameters of type Gadget 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void Board.addToActiveList(Gadget gadget)
      Add a gadget to this board's active gadgets list.
      (package private) void Board.addToDeactivatedList(Gadget gadget)
      Queues the gadget for removal from the set of active gadgets
      boolean Gadget.connect(Gadget obj)
      Connects the trigger of this object to the parameter object such that triggering this object triggers the parameter object as well.
      boolean Gadget.disconnect(Gadget obj)
      Disconnects the parameter object from this object such that when this object is triggered, obj is no longer triggered.
      private void Board.handleGadgetCollision(Gadget gadget, Ball ball)
      Deals with reflecting a ball after hitting a gadget and telling the gadget that it's been hit.
